feats.name: Toughness
feats.benefits: Increase your maximum Hit Points by your level. The DC of recovery checks is equal to 9 + your dying condition value.
feats.description: You can withstand more punishment than most.

feats.name: Fleet
feats.description: You move more quickly on foot.

feats.name: Incredible Initiative
feats.benefits: You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to initiative rolls.
feats.description: You react more quickly than others can.

feats.name: Shield Block
feats.benefits: You can use the Shield Block reaction.
feats.description: You can snap your shield into place to deflect a blow.

feats.name: Power Attack
feats.benefits: You make an attack that trades accuracy for damage.
feats.description: You unleash a particularly powerful attack that clobbers your foe but leaves you a bit unsteady.

feats.name: Sudden Charge
feats.benefits: You Stride twice and make a melee Strike.
feats.description: With a quick sprint, you dash up to your foe and swing.

feats.name: Rage
feats.benefits: You can enter a rage as explored in the barbarian's Rage ability.
feats.description: You tap into your inner fury and begin raging.

feats.name: Moment of Clarity
feats.benefits: You can use actions with the concentrate trait while raging.
feats.description: You push back your rage for a moment in order to think clearly.

feats.name: Cantrip Expansion
feats.benefits: Add one additional cantrip from your spell list to your repertoire.
feats.description: You study a wider range of simple spells.

feats.name: Familiar
feats.description: An animal serves you and assists your spellcasting.

feats.name: Sneak Attack
feats.benefits: You deal additional precision damage when you have an advantage.
feats.description: You strike where it hurts most.

feats.name: Nimble Dodge
feats.benefits: You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against one attack.
feats.description: You deftly dodge out of the way, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against one attack.

feats.name: Inspire Courage
feats.benefits: You inspire your allies with words or music, granting them a bonus to attack rolls and damage.
feats.description: You inspire your allies to fight on despite their wounds.

feats.name: Lingering Composition
feats.benefits: You can extend the duration of your compositions.
feats.description: By adding a flourish, you make your compositions last longer.

feats.name: Wild Shape
feats.benefits: You can transform into an animal form.
feats.description: You are one with the wild, always changing and adapting to meet any challenge.
